krx-hj3415
==========


This is a program gets corporation data from https://kind.krx.co.kr

Quick start
------------

1. Useful methods.
   > from krx import krx
   > 
   > krx.make_db() - *for refresh database*
   > 
   > krx.get_codes() - *return tuple include all codes*
   > 
   > krx.get_name_codes() - *return dictionary include code and name*
